title: 客户端闪退
author: Ares_XJ
txt_content: 错误报告说是 被Java运行环境检测#致命错误：### EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x5ad2de7a, pid=4584, tid=5124# exception_access_violation（0xc0000005）在PC = 0x5ad2de7a，PID = 4584，tid = 5124### JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (7.0_51-b13) (build 1.7.0_51-b13)# JRE版本：Java（TM）Se的运行环境（7.0_51-b13）（建立1.7.0_51-b13）# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (24.51-b03 mixed mode windows-x86 )# Java VM热点：Java（TM）客户VM（24.51-b03混合模式windows-x86）# Problematic frame:#问题框架：# C [OpenAL32.dll+0xde7a]# C [ openal32 DLL + 0xde7a ]。### Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows#未能写入核心转储。小型转储不在Windows的客户端版本默认启用### If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:#如果你想提交一个bug报告，请访问：# http://bugreport.sun.com/bugreport/crash.jsp# http://bugreport.sun.com/bugreport/crash.jsp# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.#事故发生在Java虚拟机在本机代码。# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.#看到问题的框架，在报告bug。

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content: 重装OpenAL及声卡驱动，或在游戏中禁止音频

replies.author: Ares_XJ
replies.txt_content:
zhh0000zhh 发表于 2014-10-7 10:27
重装OpenAL及声卡驱动，或在游戏中禁止音频
说一下步骤怎么弄，小白不怎么懂

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content:
Ares_XJ 发表于 2014-10-7 10:34
说一下步骤怎么弄，小白不怎么懂

replies.txt_content:
